Key Match Events: Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer in the third inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first victory for St. Louis in the Bronx since Tim McCarver hit a three-run homer in the 10th inning in Game 5 of the 1964 World Series and Bob Gibson pitched a complete game in a 5-2 win
Others: The Cardinals improved to 1-7 at Yankee Stadium in the regular season
Oswaldo Cabrera struck out on a pitch-clock violation and Gleyber Torres flied out before Juan Soto doubled with two down in the ninth inning
Ryan Helsley worked a shaky ninth for his 42nd save in 45 chances
